page.title: 05LOCAL ELECTIONS (CHURCHDOWN)
page.content: ON THURSDAY 2ND OF MAY 1985 THE COUNTY COUNCIL ELECTIONS WERE HELD.THE 3 LOCAL CANDIDATES WERE: { ANNE PENIKET}={S.D.P LIBERAL ALLIANCE { KELVIN TUSTIN}={LABOUR { ROGER WESTERN}={CONSERVATIVE} ALL OF THE CANDIDATES LIVE LOCALLY. THE RESULTS WERE: { ANNE PENIKET 2001 { KELVIN TUSTIN 612 { ROGER WESTERN 1332 MRS. PENIKET WAS THE ONLY CANDIDATE IN THE COUNTY IN 1985 TO GET MORE THAN 2000 VOTES. SHE HAD 669 MORE VOTES THAN THE CONSERVATIVE CANDIDATE AND 1389 MORE VOTES THAN THE LABOUR CANDIDATE. IN 1985 THERE WAS A 'HUNG' COUNCIL IN GLOUCESTERSHIRE,NO PARTY HAD AN OVER ALL MAJORITY OF VOTES: {CONSERVATIVE 23,ALLIANCE 23, LABOUR {14,OTHERS 3}.
